title: What is meant by the term Makrooh? - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: Dr Zak you just used the term makru could you just explain that term for our viewers I'm sorry makru is an Arabic word which means discouraged detestable discouraged discouraged means the scholar says it discouraged because you know onion garlic it smells smoking also smells that is the reason they say it is discouraged makum is discouraged
